title: So I learned today...
body:
That sometimes a good deed is bad.
Our jungler came late to game, about 2:30, so I waited round to give him a leash. When i got back to lane, Lost a 2v2 because I was under leveled. From then on, we just got stomped, so in a way, helping this dude out threw the game.

TL;DR
Helping people out throws games.

replies.body: You don't wait around to leash for a disconnected jungler is the nice way of saying you're an idiot.
